recipes.instructions: Combine espresso, vodka, and coffee liqueur in a shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into a martini glass. Garnish with coffee beans.
recipes.description: A delightful coffee cocktail combining the richness of dark roast espresso with the smoothness of vodka and coffee liqueur, perfect for an evening treat.

ingredients: 1 cup coarsely ground light roast coffee
recipes.instructions: Mix coffee grounds, water, and cinnamon stick in a jar. Steep in the fridge for 12–24 hours. Strain and serve over ice with milk or cream.
recipes.description: A refreshing and aromatic cold brew with the warm spice of cinnamon, perfect for a cool summer morning.

recipes.instructions: Combine brewed coffee and steamed milk in equal parts. Serve immediately.
recipes.description: A simple yet delicious French coffee classic made with equal parts brewed coffee and steamed milk for a smooth and creamy drink.

recipes.instructions: Brew espresso. Combine steamed milk, maple syrup, and vanilla extract. Pour milk mixture over espresso and garnish with cinnamon.
recipes.description: A comforting latte with the warmth of maple syrup and vanilla, topped with a dash of cinnamon for an autumn-inspired treat.

recipes.instructions: Mix brewed coffee with cocoa powder and coconut syrup. Pour over ice and garnish with toasted coconut flakes.
recipes.description: A sweet and tropical iced coffee with rich cocoa flavor, complemented by the nutty taste of coconut syrup and toasted coconut flakes.

recipes.instructions: Combine pumpkin puree, sugar, and pumpkin pie spice. Add steamed milk and espresso. Stir and serve with whipped cream if desired.
recipes.description: A seasonal favorite with rich pumpkin flavor and spices, blended into a creamy cappuccino for a cozy fall treat.
